title: Sidearm Studios - Best Sellers
description: Get all of our best sellers for a ridiculous price! (12 Packs Included!)
longDescription:
-> Listen Here <-


*$11.99 Limited Launch Time Price


Behold the craziest deal in the marketplace's history. In our latest pack "Sidearm studios Best Sellers" You will get all of our best selling packs including everything you will ever need to make a modern game!


*To get access to our entire library and free lifetime updates check out our ultimate pack)


The pack includes 12 separate packs in total:

  • Real Recorded Guns - $9.99
  • Ultimate Sci-Fi SFX Bundle (4 Separate Packs included!) - $7.99
  • Warfare SFX Bundle (3 Separate Packs Included) - $8.99
  • Survival Sound Kit
  • UI & Item Sounds - $4.99
  • Magic SFX Pro - $5.99
  • Gore Sounds Pro - $4.99
